name: aluminium sulfate production, without water, in 4.33% aluminium solution state | aluminium sulfate, without water, in 4.33% aluminium solution state | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10862/documentation

This dataset represents the production of aluminium sulfate in the region of Québec. The functional unit represent 1 kg of aluminium sulfate (Al2(SO4)3). The final product is however sold in a 4.33% aluminium solution state, which corresponds to 8.18% Al2O3, 27.45% Al2(SO4)3 or 47.69% solid aluminium sulfate (if the hydrated aluminium sulfate form is assumed to be Al2(SO4)3.14H2O).

This activity starts with the raw material delivery at the manufacturing plant gate.

This activity ends with the aluminium sulfate solution at the manufacturing plant gate.
The dataset includes the raw materials and energy consumption for production, waste generation, estimation of the infrastructure (approximation), and sulfuric acid emissions.
The process starts by mixing, using compressed air, water, aluminium hydroxide and sulfuric acid (93% solution) to obtain a 9% aluminium solution, and letting the exothermic reaction run for 1.25 hours. Vapors from the solution are treated using a venturi scrubber but some sulfuric acid emissions still occur. The wash water used in the scrubber is used in the mixing reactor. The solution is then diluted with water to obtain the final 4.33% aluminium concentration and cooled before being passed through a filter press. The aluminium sulfate solution is finally transferred to storage tanks and the filter press sludge (93% solids, non-reacted aluminium hydroxide) is left to completely dry and then sent to sanitary landfill since it is considered to be a non-hazardous waste.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data from a single manufacturing company in the region of Québec. They are used as average for the region of Québec.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data based on questionnaire from one manufacturing company, except for the infrastructure which is based on standard assumptions on plant lifetime and annual production volume.

exchanges.description: Calculated value. Based on amount of tap water input, all water is assumed to be evaporated. The water included in the sulfuric acid input is part of the final product solution so not included in the emission flow.

flow.name: Water
flow.category: Elementary flows/Emission to air/low population density

exchanges.description: Measured value. Represents the extra amount of water (0.000219925 kg) added to the reaction tank to compensate for the evaporation losses during the mixing and reaction, and the make-up water (0.218550067 kg) for the cooling system (exothermic reaction).

exchanges.description: Proxy, measured value. The residue left from the filter press (93% solids at the exit of the filter press but then left to dry completely) is composed entirely of non-reacted aluminium hydroxide and is considered as a non-hazardous inert waste. Represents 0.1% of the final solution product.

exchanges.description:
Measured and calculated value. Represents the electricity used for the production process itself (air compressor and pumps) and the electricity used for the heating of the exterior piping system during winter, building air conditioning during summer (exothermic reaction) and lighting.
